item.title: Creating my blogdown blog
item.description: My first post! What is Blogdown? What to do?? My first post! Ok so here goes. First blogdown post is happening right here! H/T and thankyou to Rebecca Barter on twitter. Her simple tweet got me to bite the bullet and actually startâ€¦. No more talking about Future Kristy. So, I thought the best first blog is to detail this process. Maybe so I can do it again?
